price: Dijeron: "Glorificado sea nuestro Señor, fuimos injustos".
arabic: قَالُواْ سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّنَآ إِنَّا كُنَّا ظَٰلِمِينَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: qālū sub'ḥāna rabbinā innā kunnā ẓālimīna
